summary: Admin dashboard application for managing karigars (workers), orders, and design codes with Excel import functionality
architectural_notes: Excel import system for karigar and design code data
Mobile-responsive design required for Safari iPhone
known_issues: Karigar mapping not displaying correctly across order tabs
Mobile Safari rendering issues - app shows at 50% zoom
Karigar names from Excel not auto-populating when updating/assigning design codes
Karigar tab names incorrectly appearing in total orders tab

existing_features.title: Fix karigar mapping not displaying correctly when viewing orders across all tabs (Today, Delivered, Hallmark, Total Orders, Customer Orders, and individual Karigar tabs). Ensure that when orders are filtered or displayed in any tab, the karigar name is correctly resolved and shown from the master design mappings.

Fix mobile Safari rendering issues where the application displays at 50% zoom. Ensure the viewport is configured correctly so the entire application interface is visible on a single page without requiring zoom adjustments on mobile screens.

When updating or assigning a design code to a different karigar in the master designs management interface, automatically populate and display the karigar name that was already derived from the uploaded Excel file. The karigar dropdown or selection field should show all existing karigars including those imported from Excel.

Remove individual karigar tab names from the Total Orders tab in the admin dashboard. Create a separate dedicated tab in the admin dashboard that displays all karigar-specific views and their orders, keeping the Total Orders tab clean and showing only aggregate order data without karigar-specific tabs.

new_feature_requests.summary: Separate karigar tabs from total orders tab in admin dashboard

projectName: Fix karigar mapping display, mobile Safari zoom issues, and separate karigar tabs from total orders
